long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Because "florists los angeles" isn't the necessarily the same as "florists near me".

Ever wish you could set your location to get local search results?

This extension enables the browser location awareness setting to be overwritten.  Hyperlocal searches can be performed by dragging your geo-location anywhere on the map.

Currently only working on Google.com; let us know if you'd like to see other countries/domains supported.

Happy local searching!
